home.subtitle: Supporting Mental Health in Morocco
home.description: We are dedicated to promoting mental health awareness and providing support to those in need.

support.title: Support
support.description: Access mental health resources and support services

advocacy.title: Advocacy
advocacy.description: Fighting stigma and promoting mental health rights

about.title: About Us
about.description: Discover our mission and the team behind AMUP

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AMUP is dedicated to promoting mental health awareness, reducing stigma, and supporting individuals and families affected by mental health challenges in Morocco.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in [YEAR], AMUP began as a small group of dedicated individuals committed to improving mental health support in Morocco. Over the years, we have grown into a national organization.
history.impact: Through our various programs and initiatives, we have helped thousands of people access mental health resources and support.

president.title: President's Message
president.greeting: Dear friends and supporters of AMUP,

content.part1: It is an honor to serve as president of the Moroccan Association of Psychiatric Users.
content.part2: We believe that mental health is a fundamental right, and we are committed to breaking down barriers.
content.part3: Together, we can create positive change and build a more understanding and supportive society.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.description: Working together for better mental health in Morocco

awareness.title: Awareness & Education
awareness.description: Increase public understanding of mental health issues and promote mental health literacy through educational programs and campaigns.

support.title: Support Services
support.description: Provide accessible support services and resources to individuals and families affected by mental health challenges.

advocacy.title: Advocacy
advocacy.description: Advocate for better mental health policies and improved access to mental health services in Morocco.

stigma.title: Stigma Reduction
stigma.description: Combat stigma and discrimination related to mental health conditions through community engagement and education.

research.title: Research & Innovation
research.description: Support research initiatives and innovative approaches to mental health care and treatment.

activities.title: Our Activities
activities.description: Discover the different ways we support mental health in our community

conferences.title: Conferences
conferences.description: Regular conferences with expert speakers, panel discussions, and workshops on various mental health topics.

support.title: Support Groups
support.description: Listening and support services provided by trained professionals and volunteers.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.description: Interactive workshops focused on mental health education, coping strategies, and skill development.

awareness.title: Awareness Walks
awareness.description: Awareness walks and public demonstrations to promote mental health awareness and reduce stigma.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team

news.title: News
news.description: Stay informed about our latest activities and events

workshop.title: Mental Health Workshop Success
workshop.description: Over 100 participants joined our recent workshop on understanding anxiety and depression, featuring expert speakers and interactive sessions.

support.title: New Support Group Launch
support.description: AMUP launches new weekly support group in Casablanca, providing a safe space for individuals to share experiences and find community.

conference.title: Annual Conference Announcement
conference.description: Save the date for our upcoming annual mental health advocacy conference, featuring international speakers and workshops.
